backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing team management, user profiles, mail system, battle requests, and team footage uploads with authorization mixins and blob storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining data types and a pass-through migration function that preserves all state between actor upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying three high-confidence issues related to infinite recursion/circular dependencies in React Query hooks and TeamDetailPage component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files documenting React Query hooks with scoped invalidation, stable callbacks, responsive UI components, and proper dependency management to prevent infinite loops.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH-based color system, dark mode support, and custom CSS variables for tournament-themed design.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with dark mode class, viewport meta tags, SEO metadata, and Open Graph tags for Beyblade X Teams application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with hash-based routing, team ID extraction, profile setup modal with proper loading checks, and conditional page rendering based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button that uses Internet Identity authentication, handles login state transitions, and clears the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal dialog for new users to enter their name during initial profile setup, saving the profile via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with error details and recovery options.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfList.ts: Empty placeholder file; PDF list functionality has been replaced with team footage gallery.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfUploade: Empty placeholder file; PDF upload functionality has been replaced with team footage uploads.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Main application header with navigation links (Home, Teams, Create Team, My Teams, Inbox, Profile), login button, unread inbox badge, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Reusable page layout wrapper component that provides consistent max-width container, optional title, and description sections.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: File upload component for profile pictures with preview, validation (PNG/JPG/WebP, max 2MB), and conversion to ExternalBlob format.
frontend/src/components/teams/BattleRequ: Modal dialog for creating battle requests between teams, allowing users to select a proposed battle date via calendar picker.
Displays incoming pending battle requests for a team with accept/reject buttons, showing requesting team name and proposed date.
frontend/src/components/teams/JoinReques: Button component for requesting to join a team, with validation to prevent joining multiple teams and feedback for request status.
frontend/src/components/teams/ScheduledB: Displays a list of scheduled (accepted) battles for a team, sorted by date, showing opponent names and confirmation badges. Includes loading states and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamFootag: Renders a gallery of team footage videos with delete functionality for team leaders. Displays videos with team avatars and includes confirmation dialogs for deletion.
Handles video file uploads for team footage with validation (max 100MB, video formats only), progress tracking, and error handling using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamIconUp: Manages team icon image uploads with preview, validation (PNG/JPG/WebP, max 2MB), and clear functionality. Supports both new uploads and displaying existing icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, handling both anonymous and authenticated states. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the current user's profile and role from the backend actor with caching and loading state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login/logout flows, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend API operations including user profiles, teams, team membership, mail/inbox, battle requests, and file uploads (team icons, footage). Includes mutations with toast notifications and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components (primary, secondary, accent, destructive, etc.) and base styles for HTML elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTeamPage.tsx: Page component for creating a new team with name input and optional icon upload. Validates user authentication and existing team membership before allowing team creation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and feature cards showcasing the app's main functionality: building teams, uploading footage, and connecting with the Beyblade X community.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Inbox page displaying user messages with mail list and detail view. Handles marking messages as read, deleting messages, and approving/denying team join requests.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderDashboardPage.t: Dashboard for team leaders showing their teams overview and pending join requests. Includes battle request management component and navigation to team detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page component that displays and allows editing of user profile information including name, about me, profile picture, and team membership details with leader/member-specific actions.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDetailPage.tsx: Team detail page component that displays team information, member list, footage gallery, and battle management features with role-based permissions using stable memoized values to prevent infinite loops.
frontend/src/pages/TeamListPage.tsx: Team list page component that displays a grid of all teams with their icons, member counts, and navigation to individual team detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/imageDataUrl.ts: Utility functions for converting image byte arrays and content types into data URLs for rendering, supporting both object URLs and base64 encoding.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, font families, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking the current fix request for resolving a maximum call stack size exceeded error, with focus on circular dependencies in React Query hooks and TeamDetailPage useMemo dependencies.
